findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical parameters and logic, potentially leading to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Race conditions and Reentrancy. Cross-function race conditions.
findings.description: Cross-function race conditions can lead to reentrancy vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Integer Overflow and Underflow
findings.description: Rounding errors occur due to division before multiplication, leading to potential integer overflow or underflow.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit.
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to a Denial of Service (DoS) attack due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Methods execution permissions.
findings.description: The function has public access, allowing anybody to call it with any amount and potentially ruin some part of the contract logic.

findings.title: The impact of the exchange rate on the logic.
findings.description: Rounding errors occur due to division before multiplication, causing potential issues with exchange rates and contract logic.

findings.title: Uninitialized storage pointers.
findings.description: Uninitialized storage pointers can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Arithmetic accuracy.
findings.description: Rounding error due to incorrect order of division and multiplication operations.

findings.title: Safe Open Zeppelin contracts implementation and usage.
findings.description: The audit report confirms that Open Zeppelin contracts are implemented and used safely.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: Rounding error
findings.description: In Solidity, division before multiplication can cause rounding errors due to the lack of floating points.
